title: I watched McDonald's customers choose between a screen and a human. It was startling
description: What kind of people prefer onscreen fast-food ordering? And who still wants to order from an actual employee? I spent an hour finding out.

title: American Airlines pilots just sent customers a dire warning (this isn't good)
description: When customers are caught up in issues that have nothing to do with them, it can be exasperating.

title: 12 gift ideas for coffee lovers this holiday season
description: Real coffee lovers usually prefer a well-crafted espresso or homemade latte over Starbucks. Save your money on a wasted gift card, and, instead elevate your coffee-lovers' caffeine ritual.
